metadata.title: CVE-2020-11099 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In FreeRDP before version 2.1.2, there is an out of bounds read inlicense_read_new_or_upgrade_license_packet. A manipulated license packetcan lead to out of bound reads to an internal buffer. This is fixed inversion 2.1.2.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
